recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Administrasi BIsnis, Manajemen Bisnis, Ilmu Komunikasi, Ekonomi (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Assist in tracking project timelines, milestones, and deliverables
2. Prepare and maintain project documentation including meeting notes, project plans, task lists, and status reports
3. Assist in updating project dashboards or tracking tools
4. Draft and distribute project updates or reminders as needed
5. Assist in preparing presentation materials for internal or external stakeholders
6. Schedule meetings, prepare agendas, and coordinate logistics for project-related discussions
7. Assist with data collection, file organization, and other administrative tasks required by the project team
8. Conduct desk research to support project requirements (e.g., benchmarking, vendor research, process mapping)
